summary: Simple shoes store website for 'luxury shop' showcasing famous/stylish shoe images with contact information (phone and WhatsApp). No pricing or online shopping functionality.
architectural_notes: Static website with no backend or e-commerce functionality
Focus on visual presentation of shoe products
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Elegant luxury shop logo for a high-end shoe store, sophisticated design with clean lines (luxury-shop-logo.dim_400x400.png)
- Stylish high-fashion women's heels on white background, professional product photography (shoe-heels.dim_800x800.png)
- Luxury men's leather dress shoes, side angle, professional lighting (shoe-dress.dim_800x800.png)
- Designer sneakers, modern street style, clean background (shoe-sneakers.dim_800x800.png)
- Elegant women's boots, full view, fashion photography style (shoe-boots.dim_800x800.png)
- Premium leather loafers, professional product shot (shoe-loafers.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a simple, elegant landing page showcasing the luxury shop brand and shoe collection
Display a gallery of famous, stylish shoe images in an attractive grid or carousel layout
Display phone number 9079846195 prominently as a contact method
Add WhatsApp contact link for number 9079846195 that opens WhatsApp when clicked
Display the generated luxury shop logo prominently in the header or hero section

Apply a sophisticated, luxury-focused visual theme with elegant typography, refined color palette (avoid blue and purple unless naturally fitting luxury aesthetic), and spacious layout that emphasizes high-end fashion photography

new_feature_requests.summary: Display famous/stylish shoe images in gallery format
